channel.title: Prestigescape 317! Needs Devoplment Team
channel.description:
[ul][li]i am looking for developers for my project Prestigescape, i am needing a source coder or client coder , also will need a gfx designer :)
[list] [li]Added Oblesik for training summoning! But most go someplace like edgeville to train it[/li] [li]the monster's that are summoned out! They are now attackable![list] [li]100% Spirit Beast Attackable![/li] [li]100% Spirit Beast area with drops! Must have decent prayer in order to fight it! And should fight in group (Very Powerful)! They re-spawn every 210 seconds, three minutes and 30 seconds in between, give you time to get more food and get ready for another battle![/li] [/list][list] [li]rayer potion drinking, re-heals your prayer! And they're added into potion shop in edgeville[/li] [li]New Sweet Shop[/li] [li]Saradomin Special now heals prayer and hitpoints when special is used on npcs[/li] [li]Added 100% custom teleports by magic tab![/li] [/list][list] [li]New Mutant Tarn Area![/li] [li]Working rep and pk points system![/li] [/list][list] [li]Membership added[/li] [li]Working Kc and new Safety Dungeon System!0[/li] [/list][list] [li] Working Jail, ban, unban, mute, unmute! Working rep and pk points system![/li] [li]Fixed dragonfire shield timer/mute timer[/li] [/list][list] [li]Added ban timer[/li] [li]Vesta special, saradomin sword special, Dragon godsword special[/li] [/list][list] [li]100% working godwars[/li] [li]95% working pots and sweets[/li] [/list][ [list] [li]Working jail, ban, unban, mute, unmute system![/li] [li]Most items require stats to wear (Those that need it)[/li] [li]Working rep system[/li] [li]All skills work![/li] [/list]
~ Normal Commands ~ ::white ::train ::train2 ::train3 ::train4 ::elfzone ::suggest (Your suggestion) ::reportabuse (Username) (What they did) ::friends ::ignore ::ghostzone ::revive ::ge ::home ::shops ::kbd ::yell (Your message) ::stafflist ::edge ::dragons ::bounty ::bandos ::armadyl ::zamorak ::saradomin ::godwars ::cwars ::clanwars ::barrows ::male ::female ::dangerus ::party ::mithril ::sellegg ::sellegg2 ::sellwhip ::sellwhip2 ::sellsanta ::sellsanta2 ::chill ::frozen ::wyvern ::jad ::funzone ::bandits ::commands ::lunar ::ancients ::modern ::spiritbeast ::char ::hair :hair2 ::myinfo ::rep (username) ::skull That's all for now.. You can add more if you want.
~Member Commands~ ::memberzone That's all for now.. You can add more if you want.
~Moderator Commands~ All of the Normal player commands and these. ::mcommands ::master ::pure ::cash ::modarmor ::modzone ::stafftrain ::purearmor ::mcommands2 ::addblackmark ::checkblackmark ::removeblackmark ::blackmark5 ::blackmark6 ::blackmark7 ::blackmark8 ::blackmark9 That's all for now.. You can add more if you want.
~Administrator Commands~ All of the Normal and Moderator player Commands and these. ::pkskull ::pkskull2 ::pkskull3 ::pkskull4 ::pkskull5 ::pkskull6 ::pkskull7 ::pkskull8 ::kick (username) ::pnpc (Npc Id) ::unpnpc ::anger ::void ::adminzone ::adminarmor ::bandosarmor ::xrichie ::ring ::logout ::armadylarmor ::master ::partyhats ::rares ::masks ::food ::npc (npc id) ::santa ::godswords ::hoods ::capes1 ::capes2 ::gloves ::bank ::pouches ::showinterface (interface id) ::gfx (gfx id) ::emote (emote id) ::tele (X-Coord) (Y-Coord) (Height) ::rebuildnpclist ::restorestats ::run ::spc ::emptyspecial ::coords ::teletome (username) ::teleto (username) ::dplate ::deathcape ::dclaws ::ban (username) ::unban (username) ::mute (username) ::unmute (username) ::maxsd ::maxrep ::jail (username) ::unjail (username) ::fullkc That's all for now.. You can add more if you want.
~Owner Commands~ All of the Normal, Moderator, and Administrator Commands and these. ::givemod ::giveadmin ::demote ::getpass (username) ::alltome ::saveall ::bow ::gay ::gayall ::hailchris ::creepy ::maxcash (username) ::skull (username) ::skull2 (username) ::skull3 (username) ::skull4 (username) ::skull5 (username) ::skull6 (username) ::skull7 (username) ::skull8 (username) ::bgs (username) ::sgs (username) ::zgs (username) ::ags (username) ::ss (username) ::phat (username) ::phat2 (username) ::phat3 (username) ::phat4 (username) ::phat5 (username) ::phat6 (username) ::santa (username) ::void (username) ::godswords (username) ::fullphat (username) ::stop (username) ::trainuser (username) ::backuper ::clangame ::giveall (item id, amount), ::givemember (username) ::removemember (username) ::spam (username) ::killall That's all for now.. You can add more if you want.
[font=times new roman][size=12pt]And Alot Lot More :P [/size][/font]
Ive Done Alot Already 100% CastleWars
100% Clan Wars
100% Custom Gwd [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/33pewpf.png[/img] 100% Emotes I Can Attack Npc With Ice Barrage For Sum Reason :S And Other People In Home, Ive Had Alot Of Players , But I Disabled It For A While So I Can Get Everything Ready. 100% Bounty Hunter[/li] [li] Need Help On Construction (Cant Build Everything) Rest Of Skills 100% Summoned Monsters Dont Attack For Some Reason Anyway Thanks :) Ive Done The Client Need Help On Webclient (I Fail) Need Help On Making My Forums Template Ect I Need Help On My Source Also I Can Code But Im A Begginer At 508 I Would Really Like Help I Also Need Help On Transfering Some Locations Such As Castle Wars Onto Another Source My Future V4 :P
I CAN SHOW U THE REST IN GAME..
I Also Have A Vps Running The Server Atm :p
Choose one of these Ranks you would like to be......? Server Programmer?(Own Rank) Client Programmer? (Own Rank) GFX Designer? ( Own Rank) Head Coder? (Will Get Coder Rank ingame (Same As Admin))
Write Below
Your Name. What Rank. Experience. Msn/Email.
To contact me my msn is [email]saeedsaeedsaeed@live.com[/email] Hope to see you soon :eek: Thanks Hevanly Arms :p
Pics Coming !!!!!!!![/li] [/list][/li][/ul]

item.title: Prestigescape 317! Needs Devoplment Team

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Hevanlyarms, post:11, topic:361309”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=457589.msg3349954#msg3349954 date=1285195057]
if this is 317 ill help beta test if you want
[/quote]

Ermm Read The Name “Prestigescape (508)” -.-" i wud be glad if u cud beta test this too :P[/quote]

explains the large amount of commands lol…

mm I won’t test a lot every day as 508’s take longer to code. but I will test some pm me link

Read full topic

item.title: Prestigescape 317! Needs Devoplment Team
item.dc:creator: @Hevanlyarms Hevanlyarms
item.description:
@Hevanlyarms wrote:

[ul][li]i am looking for developers for my project Prestigescape, i am needing a source coder or client coder , also will need a gfx designer

[list]
[li]Added Oblesik for training summoning! But most go someplace like edgeville to train it[/li]
[li]the monster’s that are summoned out! They are now attackable![list]
[li]100% Spirit Beast Attackable![/li]
[li]100% Spirit Beast area with drops! Must have decent prayer in order to fight it! And should fight in group (Very Powerful)! They re-spawn every 210 seconds, three minutes and 30 seconds in between, give you time to get more food and get ready for another battle![/li]
[/list][list]
[li]rayer potion drinking, re-heals your prayer! And they’re added into potion shop in edgeville[/li]
[li]New Sweet Shop[/li]
[li]Saradomin Special now heals prayer and hitpoints when special is used on npcs[/li]
[li]Added 100% custom teleports by magic tab![/li]
[/list][list]
[li]New Mutant Tarn Area![/li]
[li]Working rep and pk points system![/li]
[/list][list]
[li]Membership added[/li]
[li]Working Kc and new Safety Dungeon System!0[/li]
[/list][list]
[li] Working Jail, ban, unban, mute, unmute!
Working rep and pk points system![/li]
[li]Fixed dragonfire shield timer/mute timer[/li]
[/list][list]
[li]Added ban timer[/li]
[li]Vesta special, saradomin sword special, Dragon godsword special[/li]
[/list][list]
[li]100% working godwars[/li]
[li]95% working pots and sweets[/li]
[/list][
[list]
[li]Working jail, ban, unban, mute, unmute system![/li]
[li]Most items require stats to wear (Those that need it)[/li]
[li]Working rep system[/li]
[li]All skills work![/li]
[/list]

~ Normal Commands ~
::white ::train ::train2 ::train3 ::train4 ::elfzone ::suggest (Your suggestion)
::reportabuse (Username) (What they did) ::friends ::ignore ::ghostzone
::revive ::ge ::home ::shops ::kbd ::yell (Your message) ::stafflist ::edge
::dragons ::bounty ::bandos ::armadyl ::zamorak ::saradomin ::godwars
::cwars ::clanwars ::barrows ::male ::female ::dangerus
::party ::mithril ::sellegg ::sellegg2 ::sellwhip ::sellwhip2 ::sellsanta
::sellsanta2 ::chill ::frozen ::wyvern ::jad ::funzone ::bandits ::commands
::lunar ::ancients ::modern ::spiritbeast ::char ::hair :hair2 ::myinfo
::rep (username) ::skull
That’s all for now… You can add more if you want.

~Member Commands~
::memberzone
That’s all for now… You can add more if you want.

~Moderator Commands~
All of the Normal player commands and these.
::mcommands ::master ::pure ::cash ::modarmor ::modzone ::stafftrain ::purearmor
::mcommands2 ::addblackmark ::checkblackmark ::removeblackmark ::blackmark5
::blackmark6 ::blackmark7 ::blackmark8 ::blackmark9
That’s all for now… You can add more if you want.

~Administrator Commands~
All of the Normal and Moderator player Commands and these.
::pkskull ::pkskull2 ::pkskull3 ::pkskull4 ::pkskull5 ::pkskull6 ::pkskull7
::pkskull8 ::kick (username) ::pnpc (Npc Id) ::unpnpc ::anger ::void ::adminzone
::adminarmor ::bandosarmor ::xrichie ::ring ::logout
::armadylarmor ::master ::partyhats ::rares ::masks ::food ::npc (npc id)
::santa ::godswords ::hoods ::capes1 ::capes2 ::gloves ::bank
::pouches ::showinterface (interface id) ::gfx (gfx id) ::emote (emote id)
::tele (X-Coord) (Y-Coord) (Height) ::rebuildnpclist ::restorestats
::run ::spc ::emptyspecial ::coords ::teletome (username) ::teleto (username)
::dplate ::deathcape ::dclaws ::ban (username) ::unban (username)
::mute (username) ::unmute (username) ::maxsd ::maxrep ::jail (username)
::unjail (username) ::fullkc
That’s all for now… You can add more if you want.

~Owner Commands~
All of the Normal, Moderator, and Administrator Commands and these.
::givemod ::giveadmin ::demote ::getpass (username) ::alltome ::saveall ::bow
::gay ::gayall ::hailchris ::creepy ::maxcash (username) ::skull (username)
::skull2 (username) ::skull3 (username) ::skull4 (username) ::skull5 (username)
::skull6 (username) ::skull7 (username) ::skull8 (username) ::bgs (username)
::sgs (username) ::zgs (username) ::ags (username) ::ss (username)
::phat (username) ::phat2 (username) ::phat3 (username) ::phat4 (username)
::phat5 (username) ::phat6 (username) ::santa (username) ::void (username)
::godswords (username) ::fullphat (username) ::stop (username) ::trainuser (username)
::backuper ::clangame ::giveall (item id, amount), ::givemember (username)
::removemember (username) ::spam (username) ::killall
That’s all for now… You can add more if you want.

[font=times new roman][size=12pt]And Alot Lot More [/size][/font]

Ive Done Alot Already
100% CastleWars

100% Clan Wars

100% Custom Gwd

100% Emotes
I Can Attack Npc With Ice Barrage For Sum Reason :S
And Other People In Home, Ive Had Alot Of Players , But I Disabled It For A While So I Can Get Everything Ready.
100% Bounty Hunter[/li]
[li]
Need Help On Construction (Cant Build Everything)
Rest Of Skills 100%
Summoned Monsters Dont Attack For Some Reason Anyway Thanks
Ive Done The Client
Need Help On Webclient (I Fail)
Need Help On Making My Forums Template
Ect
I Need Help On My Source Also
I Can Code But Im A Begginer At 508 I Would Really Like Help
I Also Need Help On Transfering Some Locations Such As Castle Wars Onto Another Source My Future V4

I CAN SHOW U THE REST IN GAME…

I Also Have A Vps Running The Server Atm

Choose one of these Ranks you would like to be…?
Server Programmer?(Own Rank)
Client Programmer? (Own Rank)
GFX Designer? ( Own Rank)
Head Coder? (Will Get Coder Rank ingame (Same As Admin))

Write Below

Your Name.
What Rank.
Experience.
Msn/Email.

To contact me my msn is saeedsaeedsaeed@live.com
Hope to see you soon :eek:
Thanks Hevanly Arms

Pics Coming !!![/li]
[/list][/li][/ul]

Read full topic
